extendedInfo.description: â¤ Dress up Strawberry Shortcake, her berry best friends, or a photo of yourself! â¤â¤ Create cards with customized messages to send to friends and family! â¤ â¤ Unlimited combinations of sweet and stylish clothes, accessories, stickers, borders and backgrounds! â¤Welcome to the berry ultimate Dress-Up app! Your child will have hours of fashion fun dressing up Strawberry Shortcake and her friends in mix-and-match fresh-and-fruity outfits and accessories. They can even take a photo and decorate it with stickers, frames and custom messages. FEATURESâ¤ Send your creations to friends and family.â¤ Change outfits with super-cute dresses, shirts, skirts, and shoes.â¤ Unlock fruitilicious hairstyles, frames, and backgrounds.â¤ Animated stickers with all your favorite friends from Bitty Berry City.â¤ Add text bubbles and write your own sweet messages.â¤ Take or choose a photo to decorate with berry cool stickers and frames.â¤ Easy to use for kids of all ages.FASHION FUN PACKSâ¤ Cherry Jamâ¤ Lemon Meringueâ¤ Orange Blossomâ¤ Ballerinaâ¤ Princessâ¤ ChristmasACHIEVEMENTS & RECOGNITIONâ kidSAFEÂ® Certified â â Over 3 Million Downloads â ABOUT BUDGEBudge Studios leads the industry by providing entertaining apps for kids through innovation and creativity. The company develops and publishes apps for smartphones and tablets played by millions of children worldwide featuring high profile properties such as Strawberry Shortcake, Chuggington, Dora the Explorer, SpongeBob SquarePants, and Minnie Mouse.Visit us: https://www.budgestudios.comFollow us: https://twitter.com/BudgeStudiosLike us: http://www.facebook.com/BudgeStudiosWatch our trailers: http://www.youtube.com/budgestudiosKIDSAFEÂ® CERTIFICATIONStrawberry Shortcake Card Maker Dress Up (free version) (mobile app) is certified by the kidSAFEÂ® Seal Program. To learn more, click on the seal or go to www.kidsafeseal.com.

reviews.title: Nice one!
reviews.comment: It\'s a cute game but, my daughter wants plum pudding and my youngest child wants blueberry muffin! Do you have any of them? :-)
reviews.author: Teddy Garcia

reviews.title: cute game
reviews.comment: its just that everytime i choose to create cards the game restarts.  and also costly for such little addition.
reviews.author: sarah chua

reviews.title: NOT a free app.
reviews.comment: It\'s free to download, but costs $13+ to have more than one or two options. Sneaky, and FAR too expensive for a pre-k phone app. Uninstalled immediately after my four year old\'s first use.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Renker

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: This app is very nice. I just love sending pictures like these to my friends. It\'s so sweet and thoughtful. But it needs some more characters. :)
reviews.author: clare corbett

reviews.comment: Payed for a winter pack but did not get it, I want my money back! Now I have one very upset little girl.
reviews.author: Dianna Kelly

reviews.title: Does not work with LG intuition.
reviews.comment: My daughter loves this game...and on my old phone a droid razr m it was great she bought all the outfits. And when I went to my new LG intuition you can no longer play it. It just freezes. And you can\'t do anything in it.
reviews.author: Jamie Munday

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Its fun bit I wish you didn\'t have to pay so much for a few of dresses but very innertaning
reviews.author: Haddie Claire

reviews.title: Like it,but...
reviews.comment: My daughter really likes this game, but you have to buy each other character! I get that they have to make money, but it wasnt stated that this wasnt the full version. We\'ll still be playing though.
reviews.author: Jane Spotora

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: My 3 year old loves it! Wish the upgrades were cheaper though so I could buy them.
reviews.author: julie cragg

reviews.title: Great app, mostly
reviews.comment: My daughter loves this app, but it costs money to create any character  other than Strawberry, and she only comes with basic outfits. Does not include Plum, Blueberry, or Raspberry. Could use improvement.
reviews.author: Maria Martinez

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: This is a very very nice game .I love to play it . It\'s very nice . But there should be more free characters and more free things.
reviews.author: Fatima Gohar

reviews.title: Strawberry Shortcake Card Maker
reviews.comment: It\'s so fun because you get to decorate the card.
reviews.author: Kennedy Galloway

reviews.title: My daughter love this game, but...
reviews.comment: My daughter like this game, but why it just pay? Hmmmm...
reviews.author: Sari Novita

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Wow what a cool game you make cards for the people you love and/or miss pretty cool you can share. This game gets five stars from me if there we\'re a ten star rate button I would give this game a ten star rate
reviews.author: cynthia Cassidy

reviews.title: Cheap Droid Users
reviews.comment: Every app maker needs to make money. Do u work for free? Complaints are pointless. The game is fine.
reviews.author: Gena Oliver

reviews.title: Cute app
reviews.comment: My daughter had a lot of fun but I wish more of the characters were unlocked.
reviews.author: Crystal Apilado

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: My girl loves it.  Keeps her busy when boredom can be a problem
reviews.author: Kirby Dague

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: They get you in with saying its free and then you have to buy all the cool stuff
reviews.author: Catherine Wilson

reviews.title: Cute
reviews.comment: Such pretty colorful graphics but you only get strawberry shortcake, you have to pay like 3 dollars for each other character and their clothes.
reviews.author: Daisy Daisy
